entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -19.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 02:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

Temperature: -19.4°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 36 %

Dewpoint: -30.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
